column4: natew ~ hehe yeah I'm definitely firmly in the KDE camp, and I say the exact same thing about gnome. the 2 camps have been sniping at each other for years
natew ~ hehe 6 of 1, 1/2 dozen of the other
haha, which is fine with me though
exactly, its all just what you like and as long as everyones needs are met, thats all that matters
